name: LeadDyno WordPress Plugin
author: LeadDyno

sections.description:
This plugin integrates LeadDyno affiliate tracking software with WordPress by installing the LeadDyno javascript into every page. LeadDyno tracks visitors and leads. If your WordPress site has WooCommerce enabled, it will also capture purchases and upload the purchase information to your LeadDyno account. LeadDyno allows you to set up your affiliate marketing or referral program on WordPress/Woocommerce in a few easy steps. Drive more traffic and increase sales with an affiliate program.

For a complete guide for how to use LeadDyno, visit LeadDyno docs.

Key Features:

  • Customize your own branded affiliate management portal website.
  • Real-time click and commission tracking.
  • Give your affiliates a website for reporting and sharing content.
  • Create your commission plan & terms. Reward affiliates for product sales, leads, visitors, or SKUs.
  • Enable our PayPal integration to track all sales using PayPal.
  • LeadDyno tracking goes beyond tracking for affiliates. Monitor the success of all of your marketing efforts with our tracking software.
  • Automatically invite new customers to join your affiliate program.
  • Create email marketing drip campaigns for actions such as post-purchase or inquiry after cancelation.
  • Send affiliate newsletters.
  • Give affiliates access to a library of shareable content to promote your brand.
  • Setup Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) Up to 10 levels!
  • Bulk pay affiliates commissions using PayPal, Coinbase, or other payment integrations.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the leaddyno-wordpress-plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your LeadDyno Private Key and Public Key. You can find it at LeadDyno Account Page.
  4. You’re done, LeadDyno should start working.
  5. For more information check out our help doc article

1.4

1.3

1.2

  • Fix warning about dashboard page

1.1

  • Add option to disable autoWatch

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Integrates the LeadDyno affiliate tracking and web analytics service into your blog/wordpress/woocommerce site.
